00050 #define GENERIC_REPORT_FILE_ENCODING "UTF-8"
00051 #define GENERIC_REPORT_ELEMENT_NAME "GenericReport"
00052 #define NAME_VALUE_PAIRS_ELEMENT_NAME "NameValuePairs"
00053 #define NAME_VALUE_PAIR_ELEMENT_NAME "NameValuePair"
00054 #define REPORT_RESULTS_ELEMENT_NAME "ReportResults"
00055 #define ANALYSIS_PARAMETERS "Analysis Parameters"
00056 #define QC_RESULTS "QC Results"
00057 #define SAMPLE_SIGNATURE "Sample Signature"
00058 #define SAMPLE_SIGNATURE_ANALYSIS_PARAMETERS "Sample Signature Analysis Parameters"
00059 #define NAME_ATTRIBUTE "name"
00060 #define ROWS_ATTRIBUTE "rows"
00061 #define COLS_ATTRIBUTE "cols"
00062 #define VALUE_ATTRIBUTE "value"
00063 #define TYPE_ATTRIBUTE "type"
00064 #define TITLE_ATTRIBUTE "title"
00065 #define DATE_ATTRIBUTE "dateCreated"
00066 #define REPORT_TYPE "affymetrix-generic-report"
00067 #define REPORT_TITLE "Intensity Report"

00077 static string XMLChToString(const XMLCh* const c1)
00078 {
00079         string s;
00080         int i=0;
00081         while (c1[i] != 0)
00082         {
00083                 s += (char)c1[i];
00084                 ++i;
00085         }
00086         return s;
00087 }
00088 
00092 class XMLChConversion
00093 {
00094 private:
00096         XMLCh *str;
00097 
00101         void convert(int i)
00102         {
00103                 char cstr[64];
00104                 sprintf(cstr, "%d", i);
00105                 convert(cstr);
00106         }
00107 
00111         void convert(const char *const s)
00112         {
00113                 clear();
00114                 int n=(int)strlen(s);
00115                 str = new XMLCh[n+1];
00116                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00117                         str[i] = (XMLCh)s[i];
00118                 str[n]=0;
00119         }
00120 
00124         void convert(const wchar_t *const s)
00125         {
00126                 clear();
00127                 int n=(int)wcslen(s);
00128                 str = new XMLCh[n+1];
00129                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00130                         str[i] = (XMLCh)s[i];
00131                 str[n]=0;
00132         }
00133 
00135         void clear()
00136         {
00137                 if (str)
00138                         delete[] str;
00139                 str = NULL;
00140         }
00141 
00142 public:
00146         XMLChConversion(int i) { str=NULL; convert(i); }
00150         XMLChConversion(const wchar_t *const s) { str=NULL; convert(s); }
00154         XMLChConversion(std::wstring s) { str=NULL; convert( s.c_str() ); }
00158         XMLChConversion(const char *const s) { str=NULL; convert(s); }
00162         XMLChConversion(std::string s) { str=NULL; convert(s.c_str()); }
00164         ~XMLChConversion() { clear(); }
00168         const XMLCh *String() const { return str; }
00169 
00170 };
00171 
00173 #define ToXMLCh(s) ( XMLChConversion(s).String() )
00174 
00179 static bool operator==(const XMLCh* const &c1, string c2)
00180 {
00181         if (c2.length() != XMLString::stringLen(c1))
00182                 return false;
00183         for (int i=0; i<(int)c2.length(); i++)
00184         {
00185                 if (c2[i] != c1[i])
00186                         return false;
00187         }
00188         return true;
00189 }

00193 class SAXGenericReportHandlers : public XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::HandlerBase
00194 {
00195 private:
00197     GQCFileData *fileData;
00198 
00200     ParameterNameValuePairList *currentParameters;
00201 
00203     typedef enum {
00204             GENERIC_REPORT,
00205             NAME_VALUE_PAIRS,
00206             NAME_VALUE_PAIR
00207     } GenericReportElements;
00208 
00210         GenericReportElements currentElement;
00211 
00215         void MoveCurrentElementBack(const XMLCh* const name)
00216     {        
00217             if (name == 0)
00218                     return;
00219 
00220             if (name == string(NAME_VALUE_PAIR_ELEMENT_NAME))
00221                     currentElement = NAME_VALUE_PAIRS;
00222 
00223         else if (name == string(NAME_VALUE_PAIRS_ELEMENT_NAME))
00224             currentElement = GENERIC_REPORT;
00225     }
00226 
00231         bool MoveCurrentElementForward(const XMLCh* const name)
00232     {    
00233             if (name == 0)
00234                     return false;
00235 
00236             if (name == string(GENERIC_REPORT_ELEMENT_NAME))
00237                     currentElement = GENERIC_REPORT;
00238 
00239         else if (name == string(NAME_VALUE_PAIRS_ELEMENT_NAME))
00240             currentElement = NAME_VALUE_PAIRS;
00241 
00242         else if (name == string(NAME_VALUE_PAIR_ELEMENT_NAME))
00243             currentElement = NAME_VALUE_PAIR;
00244 
00245         else
00246             return false;
00247 
00248         return true;
00249     }
00250 
00251 public:
00255     SAXGenericReportHandlers(GQCFileData *data) : fileData(data), currentParameters(NULL), currentElement(GENERIC_REPORT) {}
00256 
00258     ~SAXGenericReportHandlers() {}
00259 
00261     void startDocument() {}
00262 
00264     void endDocument() {}
00265 
00270         void characters(const XMLCh *const chars, const XMLSize_t length) {}
00271 
00276         void startElement(const XMLCh* const name, XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::AttributeList& attributes)
00277     {
00278             if (MoveCurrentElementForward(name) == false)
00279                     return;
00280 
00281         // Get the attributes.
00282             map<string, string> atts;
00283             unsigned int len = attributes.getLength();
00284             for (unsigned int index = 0; index < len; index++)
00285             {
00286                     atts[XMLChToString(attributes.getName(index))] = XMLChToString(attributes.getValue(index));
00287             }
00288 
00289         // Store the results
00290             switch (currentElement)
00291             {
00292             case GENERIC_REPORT:
00293                 break;
00294 
00295             case NAME_VALUE_PAIRS:
00296                 if (atts[NAME_ATTRIBUTE] == ANALYSIS_PARAMETERS)
00297                     currentParameters = &fileData->AnalysisParameters();
00298                 else if (atts[NAME_ATTRIBUTE] == QC_RESULTS)
00299                     currentParameters = &fileData->QCResults();
00300                 else if (atts[NAME_ATTRIBUTE] == SAMPLE_SIGNATURE)
00301                     currentParameters = &fileData->SampleSignature();     
00302                                 else if (atts[NAME_ATTRIBUTE] == SAMPLE_SIGNATURE_ANALYSIS_PARAMETERS)
00303                     currentParameters = &fileData->SampleSignature();
00304                                 else    
00305                     currentParameters = NULL;
00306                 break;
00307 
00308             case NAME_VALUE_PAIR:
00309                 if (currentParameters != NULL)
00310                 {
00311                     ParameterNameValuePair param;
00312                     param.Name = StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(atts[NAME_ATTRIBUTE]);
00313                     param.Value = StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(atts[VALUE_ATTRIBUTE]);
00314                     currentParameters->push_back(param);
00315                 }
00316                 break;
00317 
00318                 default:
00319                         break;
00320         }
00321     }
00322 
00326     void endElement(const XMLCh* const name) { MoveCurrentElementBack(name); }
00327 
00328 };

00341 /* Clear the data. */
00342 void GQCFileData::Clear()
00343 {
00344     qcResults.clear();
00345     sampleSignature.clear();
00346     analysisParameters.clear();
00347         sampleSignatureParameters.clear();
00348 }

00350 /* Read the file. */
00351 bool GQCFileData::Read(const std::string &fileName)
00352 {
00353     Clear();
00354 
00355         // Initialize the XML4C2 system
00356         try
00357         {
00358                 XMLPlatformUtils::Initialize();
00359         }
00360         catch (const XMLException&)
00361         {
00362                 return false;
00363         }
00364 
00365         bool status = false;
00366         SAXParser* parser = new SAXParser;
00367         parser->setValidationScheme(SAXParser::Val_Never);
00368         parser->setLoadExternalDTD(false);
00369         parser->setDoNamespaces(false);
00370         parser->setDoSchema(false);
00371         parser->setValidationSchemaFullChecking(false);
00372         SAXGenericReportHandlers handler(this);
00373         parser->setDocumentHandler(&handler);
00374         parser->setErrorHandler(&handler);
00375         try
00376         {
00377                 parser->parse(fileName.c_str());
00378                 int errorCount = parser->getErrorCount();
00379                 if (errorCount == 0)
00380                 {
00381                         status = true;
00382                 }
00383         }
00384         catch (...)
00385         {
00386                 status = false;
00387         }
00388         delete parser;
00389         XMLPlatformUtils::Terminate();
00390         return status;
00391 }
00392 
00393 /* Create a root element */
00394 static DOMElement *CreateGenericReportElement(DOMDocument* doc)
00395 {
00396     DOMElement* element = doc->createElement(ToXMLCh(GENERIC_REPORT_ELEMENT_NAME));
00397     element->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(TYPE_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(REPORT_TYPE));
00398     element->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(TITLE_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(REPORT_TITLE));
00399     DateTime now = DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime();
00400     element->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(DATE_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(now.ToString()));
00401     return element;
00402 }
00403 
00404 /* Add the name/value pairs to the document. */
00405 static void AddNameValuePairs(const char *title, ParameterNameValuePairList &params, DOMDocument* doc, DOMElement* parentElement)
00406 {
00407     if (params.size() == 0)
00408         return;
00409 
00410     DOMElement* element = doc->createElement(ToXMLCh(NAME_VALUE_PAIRS_ELEMENT_NAME));
00411     element->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(NAME_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(title));
00412     for (ParameterNameValuePairList::iterator it=params.begin(); it!=params.end(); it++)
00413     {
00414         ParameterNameValuePair &pair = *it;
00415         DOMElement* pairElement = doc->createElement(ToXMLCh(NAME_VALUE_PAIR_ELEMENT_NAME));
00416         pairElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(NAME_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(pair.Name));
00417         pairElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(VALUE_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(pair.Value));
00418         element->appendChild(pairElement);
00419     }
00420     parentElement->appendChild(element);
00421 }
00422 
00423 /*
00424  * Add an empty table (required by the DTD).
00425  */
00426 static void AddBlankReportTable(DOMDocument* doc, DOMElement* parentElement)
00427 {
00428     DOMElement* element = doc->createElement(ToXMLCh(REPORT_RESULTS_ELEMENT_NAME));
00429     element->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(NAME_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh("NA"));
00430     element->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(ROWS_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh("0"));
00431     element->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(COLS_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh("0"));
00432     parentElement->appendChild(element);
00433 }
00434 
00435 /* Write the file. */
00436 bool GQCFileData::Write(const std::string &fileName)
00437 {    
00438         // Initialize the XML4C2 system.
00439         try
00440         {
00441                 XMLPlatformUtils::Initialize();
00442         }
00443         catch (const XMLException&)
00444         {
00445                 return false;
00446         }
00447 
00448         // Create a DOM implementation object and create the document type for it.
00449         DOMImplementation *impl = DOMImplementationRegistry::getDOMImplementation(ToXMLCh(L"LS"));
00450         DOMDocument* doc = impl->createDocument();
00451         //doc->setStandalone(true);
00452 
00453         // Create the serializer.
00454         DOMLSSerializer *theSerializer = ((DOMImplementationLS*)impl)->createLSSerializer();
00455         DOMLSOutput     *theOutputDesc = ((DOMImplementationLS*)impl)->createLSOutput();
00456         //theSerializer->setEncoding(ToXMLCh(GENERIC_REPORT_FILE_ENCODING));
00457         theOutputDesc->setEncoding(ToXMLCh(GENERIC_REPORT_FILE_ENCODING));
00458 
00459     // Create the root element
00460     DOMElement *rootElement = CreateGenericReportElement(doc);
00461 
00462         // store the parameters
00463         AddNameValuePairs(ANALYSIS_PARAMETERS, analysisParameters, doc, rootElement);
00464         AddNameValuePairs(QC_RESULTS, qcResults, doc, rootElement);
00465         AddNameValuePairs(SAMPLE_SIGNATURE, sampleSignature, doc, rootElement);
00466         AddNameValuePairs(SAMPLE_SIGNATURE_ANALYSIS_PARAMETERS, sampleSignatureParameters, doc, rootElement);
00467 
00468     // Add an empty table (required by the DTD)
00469     AddBlankReportTable(doc, rootElement);
00470 
00471     // Store the element to the document.
00472     doc->appendChild(rootElement);
00473 
00474         // Write the file.
00475         bool status = false;
00476         XMLFormatTarget *myFormTarget = new LocalFileFormatTarget(fileName.c_str());
00477         theOutputDesc->setByteStream(myFormTarget);
00478         try
00479         {
00480                 theSerializer->write(doc, theOutputDesc);
00481                 status = true;
00482         }
00483         catch (...)
00484         {
00485                 status = false;
00486         }
00487 
00488         // Clean up
00489         doc->release();
00490         theOutputDesc->release();
00491         theSerializer->release();
00492         delete myFormTarget;
00493         XMLPlatformUtils::Terminate();
00494 
00495         return status;
00496 }
